articles.title: Amazon, Apple make a deal to offer Apple TV+ in a Prime bundle - Ars Technica
articles.description: Both Amazon and Apple want to be your core service.

articles.author: Tufts University
articles.title: Inspired by Spider-Man, researchers recreate web-slinging technology - Phys.org
articles.description: Every kid who has read a comic book or watched a Spider-Man movie has tried to imagine what it would be like to shoot a web from their wrist, fly over streets, and pin down villains. Researchers at Tufts University took those imaginary scenes seriously and cr…
